title: 1. Pages
content:
The hierarchy of the site is driven by the /data/pages.json file. Each page can have the following attributes defined for it:
Attribute NameAttribute Value
nameValue used to construct the url to the page
themeName of the theme to use for this page, inherits from parent
redirectTarget to display instead of this page
childrenArray of child page declarations
layoutlayout to use for this page (refer to the Layouts documentation
dataarray of objects that assign content to containers.
